descriptionHtml:
This VERY simply puts mysterious shrouded nordic ruins (entrance only) near Riverwood, it got its name because it has always been surrounded by a thick layer of mist....
The locals tell stories about unearthly beating sounds coming from within the fog....
________________________________Installation_______________________________________________              ________________________________________Simply just put .esp into /Data folder.
_______________________________Known bugs_______________________________________________
For me, I can\'t see any of the nordic ruins pieces when I enter the game... please let me know if anyone can see the full thing, if not, then can someone advise me on how to address this issue?
EDIT: Apparently this bug is caused by the ck so Bethesda needs to fix this!
________________________________Notes__________________________________________________
This is literally my first attempt at any type of modding so I would appreciate some constructive criticism plox!
In future I will be making some sort of BIG HUGE ancient tree forest village/house type thing lol.
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15046]CHECK OUT MY OTHER MOD![/URL]

Oh and there is a surprise behind the door... tehe
author: remyninja
